name: @flexn/renative-monorepo
description: ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€ Unified Development Platform. Bootstrap, Develop & Deploy `iOS`, `tvOS`, `Android`, `Android TV`, `Fire TV`, `Android Wear`, `Web`, `Tizen TV`, `Tizen Watch`, `Tizen Mobile`, `LG webOS`, `macOS/OSX`, `Windows`, `KaiOS`, `FirefoxOS`, `Firefox TV`, `Linux` and `Chromecast` platforms
author: Pavel Jacko <pavel.jacko@gmail.com> (https://github.com/pavjacko)

scripts.bootstrap: yarn run link:rnv && npx lerna bootstrap && yarn build
scripts.bootstrap-clean: rm -rf ./node_modules; npx lerna clean --yes && yarn bootstrap
scripts.deploy-all: yarn build && yarn test && yarn deploy-prepare && npm run git-commit-tag
scripts.deploy:canary: yarn deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --dist-tag canary --yes && git push origin HEAD
scripts.deploy:canary:soft: yarn deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --dist-tag canary --yes
scripts.deploy:feat: yarn deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --dist-tag feat --yes && git push origin HEAD
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --yes && git push origin HEAD
scripts.e2e-template-starter-android: cd packages/template-starter && npx rnv build -p android -s test -c template --packageManager yarn && yarn e2e:android
scripts.e2e-template-starter-androidtv: cd packages/template-starter && npx rnv build -p androidtv -s test -c template --packageManager yarn && yarn e2e:androidtv
scripts.e2e-template-starter-ios: cd packages/template-starter && npx rnv build -p ios -s test -c template --packageManager yarn && yarn e2e:ios
scripts.e2e-template-starter-macos: cd packages/template-starter && npx rnv build -p macos -s test -c template --packageManager yarn && yarn e2e:macos
scripts.e2e-template-starter-tvos: cd packages/template-starter && npx rnv build -p tvos -s test -c template --packageManager yarn && yarn e2e:tvos
scripts.e2e-template-starter-web: cd packages/template-starter && npx rnv start -p web -s test -c template --packageManager yarn & sleep 60 && cd packages/template-starter && yarn e2e:web && kill $(lsof -t -i:8080)
scripts.link:rnv: npm r rnv -g && cd packages/rnv && npm link
scripts.watch-alt: npx lerna run compile & npx lerna watch -- lerna run compile

title: ReNative
